text: Rudolf Eric Koertzen (; 26 March 1949 â€“ 9 August 2022) was a South African international cricket umpire. He began umpiring in 1981. He later became a full-time official eleven years later. He was born in Knysna, South Africa. Koertzen was killed in a car crash near Riversdale, South Africa on 9 August 2022 at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2022 deaths Category:South African cricketers
title: Rudi Koertzen
